definition: just in case/if by any chance/contingency
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to guard against the unexpected (idiom); just in case/prepared for any eventualities
better to be safe than sorry (proverb)/to be prepared just in case
pinyin: bu4 pa4 yi1 wan4 , jiu4 pa4 wan4 yi1

sentences.english: If you think he is a good man, think again.
sentences.chinese: 万一你以为他是善人，那你就大谬不然了。

sentences.english: He was worried about what might happen if they leaked out information.
sentences.chinese: 他担心万一他们走漏了风声会出什么事。

sentences.english: Raj :Oh, we should have a plan in case one of us gets lucky.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我们得制定个计划以防万一我们中有谁走桃花运。

sentences.english: But she kept overfeeding her cat just in case.
sentences.chinese: 但是她一直过量地喂着她的猫，以防万一。

sentences.english: These were extra wedges in case they should be needed.
sentences.chinese: 这些额外的木楔是以防万一的。

sentences.english: Have some candles at hand in case lights fuse .
sentences.chinese: 手边准备点蜡烛，万一保险丝烧断了。

sentences.english: In circumstance of, if have what matter confuse, be a then it possible to be life it loses.
sentences.chinese: 万一，要是有什么事打搅了，那便可能是性命之失。

sentences.english: I will never marry another man if you should die before me.
sentences.chinese: 万一你比我先死的话，我决不会再嫁给其他的男人。

sentences.english: Never shut down you mobile, in case of I am sick , I need you take me to hosipital , stay with me.
sentences.chinese: 唔好关机，万一半夜我有事要去急症室我想你陪住我。

sentences.english: We haudio-videoe an auxiliary generator in case of power cuts.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一台万一断电时运用的备用发电机。

sentences.english: With the car, if left behind is not the speed chase.
sentences.chinese: 而跟车，万一掉队了也不要超速追赶。

sentences.english: Be more careful not to miss once than to hit a hundred times.
sentences.chinese: 多加小心，避免万一失手胜过百发百中。

sentences.english: Tung and Fong continued their vigil , hoping against hope.
sentences.chinese: 董和方继续守护着，抱着万一的希望。

sentences.english: If swallowed immediately sent to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 万一吞下请立即送院就医。

sentences.english: I took the precaution of locking money in the safe.
sentences.chinese: 我把所有的钱都锁在保险箱里以防万一。

definition: more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
so as not to/so as to avoid
(posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
when the moment comes/at that time
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
